about.title: About LuxStore
about.subtitle: We're on a mission to bring you the finest premium products from around the world. Quality, style, and exceptional service are at the heart of everything we do.
about.storyPara1: Founded in 2020, LuxStore began with a simple vision: to make premium, high-quality products accessible to everyone, everywhere.
about.storyPara2: What started as a small online boutique has grown into a global marketplace trusted by thousands of customers worldwide. We've built our reputation on three core principles: quality, authenticity, and exceptional customer service.
about.storyPara3: Today, we partner with leading brands and manufacturers to bring you the latest in technology, fashion, home goods, and lifestyle products. Every item in our collection is carefully curated to meet our high standards.
about.storyPara4: But we're more than just a store. We're a community of people who appreciate the finer things in life and believe that everyone deserves access to quality products.
about.valuesSubtitle: The principles that guide everything we do
about.qualityFirstDesc: We only source the finest products from trusted manufacturers worldwide.
about.customerFocusedDesc: Your satisfaction is our top priority. We're here to help 24/7.
about.globalReachDesc: Shipping to over 50 countries with fast and reliable delivery.
about.secureShoppingDesc: Your data is protected with enterprise-level security.
about.joinSubtitle: Be part of a community that values quality, style, and exceptional service

assistant.title: AI Shopping Assistant
assistant.placeholder: Ask about products, prices, or recommendations...
assistant.startTitle: How can I help you today?
assistant.startSubtitle: Ask me anything about products, prices, recommendations, or get personalized shopping advice.
assistant.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm your AI shopping assistant. How can I help you today?
assistant.greetingResponse: Hello! How can I assist you with your shopping today?
assistant.laptopResponse: I found several laptops matching your criteria. Would you like to see budget, mid-range, or premium options?
assistant.findResponse: I can help you find products based on your preferences. Could you tell me more about what you're looking for?
assistant.thankResponse: You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help you with?
assistant.priceResponse: I can filter products by price range. What's your budget for this purchase?
assistant.defaultResponse: I'm your AI shopping assistant. I can help you find products, compare prices, and provide personalized recommendations. What would you like to do today?
assistant.errorMessage: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.
assistant.voiceNotSupported: Voice input is not supported in your browser
